description: This file contains CSS styles for a web application, including theme management variables, styles for various components such as App, App-header, and buttons, as well as animations for the logo.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with styles for layout and theme management.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: The header section of the application, styled for alignment and responsiveness.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: A button for toggling between themes, styled for interactive feedback.
